procedural_fairness: judicial review application under the Federal Court Act
applicable_regulations: Section 32 of the Crown Liability and Proceedings Act
specific limitations for assessments and collections in the Income Tax Act
decision_reasoning: Income Tax Act is a complete code with its own limitations, implying exclusion of general limitation periods
result_of_case: no limitation period applies to the Crown's tax collection powers under the Income Tax Act
cause_of_action: large unpaid tax debt after years of inactivity
